name: SumerianVirtualHome
0:
”Alexa, ask virtual home to turn lights on”
”Alexa, ask virtual home to toast”
”Alexa, ask virtual home to turn TV on”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: virtual home
des: Start with "Ask virtual home" and choose from the options to turn lights on/off, turn tv on/off, or toast your bread.
